title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Imprisoned in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden.

title: The Godfather
description: Spanning the years 1945 to 1955, a chronicle of the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime with the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addled gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge in this sprawling, comedic crime caper.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events.

title: Inception
description: Cobb, a skilled thief who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets is offered a chance to regain his old life.

title: The Matrix
description: Set in the 22nd century, The Matrix tells the story of a computer hacker who joins a group of underground insurgents fighting the vast and powerful computers who now rule the earth.

title: Interstellar
description: The adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Aragorn is revealed as the heir to the ancient kings as he, Gandalf and the other members of the broken fellowship struggle to save Gondor.

title: Fight Club
description: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy.
